resources.string: Legacy API: from Android2.2 was abandoned, through the software algorithm to achieve. \n The new API: through the "magnetic field sensor and acceleration sensor" co-access (do not believe that a magnet close to the phone try). \n both may have errors, but also their own flaws, it is recommended to confirm each other.

Dial mode: This is the regular compass app mode, this mode, the dial is always the right direction, the pointer for the phone direction. \n pointer mode: This mode is to simulate the real compass, dial for the phone direction, the pointer always points in the correct direction.

Welcome to update to the new version, this version of the setup interface and architecture to do a complete refactoring, the structure is more concise, and more easy to use. But changes in the architecture lead to data is not common. \n It is worth noting that your choice may cause some problems with the application. If a problem occurs, you can clear the user data to recover. \n So do you want to clone old data to the new version?
You are not authorized to use location permissions and will not be able to display location information. Whether to open?
You are not authorized to use the sensor and will not be able to display the orientation information. Whether to open?
You are not authorized to use the camera and will not be able to display azimuth information. Whether to open?
The location provider is not found. Please check if the location is turned on.
Currently for the new API mode
There is a new location available source available:

You are not authorized to read and write storage space, the application will not be able to get the custom font in the storage space, and you will use the system default font. \n is turned on and the restart application takes effect. Is it open manually?
This is made by XiaoLiang! Remember me! And I may change the name, called Lollipop
The background color of the compass dial
The scale color of the compass dial
The color of the compass dial
The color of the compass pointer
The background color of the compass pointer
The color of the text description information
Displays the background color of the interface
The interface background will appear as a picture
The interface background will be displayed as background color
Click to select the background image
The dial background will appear as a picture
The dial background will be displayed as background color
The pointer background will appear as a picture
The pointer background will be displayed as background color
Click to select the pointer image
The home page will display the settings button and the reboot will take effect.
The home page will no longer show the settings button, reboot will take effect.
Has opened the stable mode, the azimuth of the decimal places will be forced to quit, which will improve the compass jitter problem.
The stable mode has been turned off and you will see the most accurate data, but there may be high frequency jitter.

Has opened the Chinese mode, the orientation flag will be described in Chinese. Custom font: go to the phone to save the directory, find LCompass/ttf/, which put a font called fonts.ttf (or fonts.otf), and then restart the application can be.

The Chinese mode is turned off and the orientation flag will be described in letters. Custom font: go to the phone to save the directory, find LCompass/ttf/, which put a font called fonts.ttf (or fonts.otf), and then restart the application can be.
Has started overflow to avoid, 3D mode, will hide the tick marks, to prevent rotation caused by the problem of drawing overflow.
Has been turned off for overflow, 3D mode, will not hide the tick marks, may cause the drawing to overflow due to rotation.
Click to select the dial image
has been started, will reduce the jitter of the dial or pointer according to the trend
noise reduction is turned off, you will see the most real data
